declarations.description:
`simple-colors`
a shared set of styles for `@haxtheweb`
### Styling
See demo of "all of the colors" (`demo/colors.html`) for styling.

declarations.description:
`simple-colors-picker`
a select element for changing `simple-colors` attributes in demos

### Styling
See demo of "all of the colors" (`demo/colors.html`) for styling.
declarations.name: SimpleColorsPicker

members.name: tag
members.description: Store the tag name to make it easier to obtain directly.

members.name: _getOptions
members.description: gets options for the selectors

members.name: _fireChangeEvent
members.description: Fires with any property change.
